::DarkMouse::

She stuck her tongue out at Megatron.
"Look lizard lips, I was only trying to help come up with a way to 
save our hides.   If you want to meet the matrix, that's fine.  I did 
once and trust me, it's nothing like what you would expect, Scale 
Face."  She stormed off and out into the outer corridoor. She was 
mad.  She had tried to put aside her hate and actualy try to help.  
If heasn'tgoing to try, then niether was she.  She walked out and 
into another tunnel.  She transformed into mouse mode and scurried 
off.  She stopped and transformed back into bot mode and proceeded to 
punch dents into a stone wall.  Her mech fluid glowed slightly in the 
darkness of the hall, but she didn't care.  She was just plain 
lossing her temper. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron snaps at Darkmouse, "If the Aliens do get here, they 
will kill 
> us. Its programmed into its A.I. unit. Now, go away and let me 
work, vermine!"
